lines.name: Red Line
lines.description: The Red Line is the oldest and busiest line in the Metrorail system, connecting Shady Grove in Montgomery County, Maryland to Glenmont via downtown Washington, D.C.

lines.name: Blue Line
lines.description: The Blue Line serves Fairfax County, Arlington County, and Prince George's County, passing through downtown D.C. and connecting to Reagan National Airport.

lines.name: Orange Line
lines.description: The Orange Line connects Fairfax County, Virginia to Prince George's County, Maryland, serving Vienna, Falls Church, Arlington, and downtown D.C.

lines.name: Green Line
lines.description: The Green Line runs from Greenbelt in Prince George's County to Branch Avenue, serving the U Street corridor and Anacostia neighborhoods.

lines.name: Yellow Line
lines.description: The Yellow Line is the shortest line in the system, connecting Huntington in Fairfax County to Mt Vernon Square in D.C., serving Pentagon and Reagan National Airport.

lines.name: Silver Line
lines.description: The Silver Line is the newest line in the system, connecting Loudoun County and Dulles International Airport to downtown D.C. and Prince George's County.
